metadata.title: USN-3421-2 -- Libidn2 vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-3421-1 fixed a vulnerability in Libidn2. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM and Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3421-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libidn2-0-dev - 0.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libidn2-0 - 0.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 idn2 - 0.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
